alert.note: Alert for South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 11:46AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Elko County through 1215 PM PDT... At 1145 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles south of Oasis, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Elko County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County
